member.name: T:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.GenericSystem
member.summary: GenericSystem class represents a 3D GenericSystem object. Refer to the Systems and Specifications documentation for further details.

member.name: T:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System
member.summary: System is the abstract base class for all the other system classes that are part of the systems and specifications .NET implementation. This class provides support for the interfaces that are common to all systems - ISystem, ISystemChild, IAllowableSpecs, and INamedItem.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.#ctor(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.PrivateBusinessObject)
member.summary: Protected business object wrapper constructor for the base system class.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.#ctor
member.summary: Public business object wrapper constructor for base system class.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.Finalize
member.summary: Destructor for the System class.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.AddSystemChild(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.ISystemChild)
member.summary: Implementation of ISystem:AddSystemChild using the system helper of CommonMiddle.
member.param: Wrapped system object to be added to the collection of children.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.AddAllowableSpec(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.SpecificationBase)
member.summary: Adds a specification to the collection of specifications assigned to a system.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.RemoveAllowableSpec(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.SpecificationBase)
member.summary: Removes a specification from the collection of specifications assigned to a system.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.ReplaceAllowableSpecs(System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection{Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.SpecificationBase})
member.summary: Replaces the collection of specifications assigned to a system.
member.param: Collection of new specifications to be assigned to the system.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.ResetToParentSpecs
member.summary: Resets the collection of specifications assigned to a system with the same collection assigned to the parent system.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.GetNameRuleHelper
member.summary: Private utility method to get and manage the name rule helper object.
member.returns: m_oNameRuleHelper - Occurrence to the name rule helper object.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.SetUserDefinedName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the user-defined name of an item.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.GetNamedItemHelper
member.summary: Private utility method to get and manage the named item helper object.
member.returns: m_oNamedItemHelper - Occurrence of the named item helper object.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.SetActiveNameRule(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the active name rule.
member.param: String indicating the name rule to be used. If this string is left blank, the first rule that is not user-defined will be used.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.SystemType
member.summary: Return a string that identifies the class of the system, based on the identifying interface supported by the system.

member.name: P:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.SystemChildren
member.summary: Implementation of ISystem:SystemChildren using the system helper of CommonMiddle.

member.name: P:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.SystemParent
member.summary: Implementation of ISystemChild:System parent property. Uses the system helper of CommonMiddle.

member.name: P:Ingr.SP3D.Systems.Middle.System.AllowableSpecs
member.summary: Gets the collection of specifications assigned to a system.

member.summary: Gets or sets the active name rule assigned to a run.

member.summary: Gets the read-only name of the property.
